title: tAmadam sheivadEnO
sahitya:
tAmadam sheivadEnO svAminAthanE nI dayavODendanukkabhayam tandiDAmal


anupallavi

  kAmanai eritta mukkaNNan maindanE nI manam kaninden nilai kaNDirangAmal


caraNam    vallamaiyillAmal vAzhkkaip-pOril nAn ellaiyillAmal tollai uruvadellAm
kallum karaiyumAru sholli muraiyiTTum pullaDi En paDum pollA vinai taDukka
